characters.name: Cho Chang
characters.description: Cho is the Seeker for the Ravenclaw Quidditch team. She is also a part of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Luna Lovegood
characters.description: Luna is often seen as being weird, but she is just unique. Not only is she great at spotting Nargles, she is a wonderful artist and true friend.

characters.name: Gilderoy Lockhart
characters.description: Careful with Professor Lockhart! While an author, professor, and five-time winner of Witch Weekly's Most Charming Smile Award, Gilderoy Lockhart is great at memory charms.

characters.name: Quirinus Quirrell
characters.description: Known for his stuttering, Professor Quirrell once held the role of Defense Against the Dark Arts professor...there's something suspicious about him.

characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: Harry Potter is the boy who lived...He was singled out by Lord Voldemort at birth to be his greatest rival, and our hero.

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: One of the smartest witches alive, Hermione Granger is not a force to be reckon with.

characters.name: Ron Weasley
characters.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry Potter's best friends. He is an excellent Wizard Chess player, and was the Gryffindor Quidditch team's goalkeeper for one year.

characters.name: Minerva McGonagall
characters.description: The strict but fair Head of Gryffindor house and Transfiguration teacher.

characters.name: Albus Dumbledore
characters.description: An incredibly powerful wizard. Albus Dumbledore is the Headmaster of Hogwarts, founder of the Order of the Phoenix, and has a foundness for sherbet lemons and knitting patterns.

characters.name: Neville Longbottom
characters.description: A clumsy but keen Herbology student and shy Gryffindor with great inner strength.

characters.name: Sirius Black
characters.description: Harry's Animagus godfather who famously escaped from Azkaban. He is an old friend of James and Lily Potter.

characters.name: Remus Lupin
characters.description: He taught Harry Potter how to defend himself against the Dementors. Lupin is a member of the Order of the Phoenix, Hogwarts teacher, Tonks' husband, and a werewolf.

characters.name: Ginny Weasley
characters.description: The youngest Weasley child. Ginny is brave, tenacious, and an accomplished Quidditch player.

characters.name: Nymphadora Tonks
characters.description: Tonks is a Metamorphmagus and Auror. She has distinctive hair and is a member of the Order of the Phoenix.

characters.name: Cedric Diggory
characters.description: Popular Hufflepuff Seeker and competitor in the Triwizard Tournament.

characters.name: Amelia Bones
characters.description: Niece of Ameila Bones, who was the Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, and a member of Dumbledore's Army.

characters.name: Justin Finch-Fletchley
characters.description: Muggle-born Hufflepuff student who was also accepted to Eton.

characters.name: Severus Snape
characters.description: Hogwarts Potions master, Head of Slytherin house and former Death Eater. Holds a grudge against Harry Potter.

characters.name: Draco Malfoy
characters.description: A pure-blood wizard, proud Slytherin, and Harry Potter's arch rival at Hogwarts.

characters.name: Bellatrix Lestrange
characters.description: One of Voldemort's most loyal Death Eaters, sent to Azkaban for her crimes. A dangerous witch and duelist.

characters.name: Lucius Malfoy
characters.description: Draco's father who serves Lord Voldemort as a Death Eater in both Wizarding Wars.

characters.name: Lord Voldemort
characters.description: Formely known as Tom Marvolo Riddle, and commonly reffered to as He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. The most powerful Dark Wizard of all time.
